text: Egidio Alagna (31 October 1935 â€“ 3 May 2022) was an Italian politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Italian Socialist Party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 1992. He was born in Marsala, Italy. Alagna died in Palermo, Italy on 3 May 2022 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian judges Category:Politicians from Sicily
title: Egidio Alagna
